Advance-tech: Smart living applies advanced technologies to high-end projects to bring a high standard of living for the residents. Such technologies include Smart Security Monitoring, Smart Parking, Smart Home and Smart Operations Management
Comprehensive-Shome: We are proud to provide the most comprehensive smart home solution for customers
speaker: Smart speaker

customers-shoes: Putting yourself in the customers' shoes is a strategy we employ here at Sliving to understand what the customer needs. To change the customer's uncertainty about the domestic smart product quality, we have been perfecting our products. This is proved by multiple international quality certificates that we have and will receive in the near future, MFi is one of them.

goal-leading1: Intending to lead the smart technology market, Sliving is the first enterprise licensed to manufacture devices in the Smart Living ecosystem. The factory has an area of ​​nearly 4500m2, the total production capacity is estimated at
goal-leading3: In which, the production capacity in phase 1 of the project will be

Project-staffs: Project staff, technical staff, and sales staff are ready to advise/support customers with suitable solutions to meet each customer's expectations with low costs.
better-and-better: are developing and innovating continuously to improve SLIVING products better and better everyday.
IoT-Flatform: A pioneer in providing comprehensive solutions for IoT Flatform in Vietnam
private-vehicles: You often worry on the road that you do not know if the upcoming parking lot is available or not. When you get there, you will have to waste time looking for an empty place in the cellar. All the above problems are solved by Smart Parking solution - smart parking of SLiving.
Lighting-solutions: Smart lighting solutions for your projects
core-feature: The core feature of smart lighting is the flexibility of the control system – meaning the users won't need to rely on traditional wall switches to turn the lights on/off. This system will help control the light anywhere in the house through an app on a mobile phone, or tablet. Not only that, smart lighting products also have many extremely outstanding features such as being able to manually adjust power, brightness, timer on and off, changing colors according to the music...
embody-core-values: Each SLIVING member is expected to embody core values ​​such as attitudes, behaviors, beliefs, and values in any position in the organization. These core values ​​are formed from the values ​​of the people who run the business and the collective of workers.
Smart-Security-system: Products in the Smart Security system
Smart-parking-product: Products in the Smart Parking system
smart-apartment-description: With Sliving smart home, the users can control and manage the smart devices located inside the house through the application installed on their phone or tablet. By that way, the customers can monitor, turn on/off the air conditioning system, electricity, and water, ... while they not there. Not only that, the smart home can also trigger alarms for emergency situations such as: fire, earthquake, to family members having an accident/fall, injury, etc. .
security-description: SLiving's smart security solution builds a “multi-layer” security system that ensures a private, safe space for each customer and is easy to control for managers.

fingerprint-recognition.step_1: Use fingerprint recognition method to close / open the door.
fingerprint-recognition.step_2: Integrated with magnetic card scanner, password.
fingerprint-recognition.step_3: There are clear lights and tones for all cases.
fingerprint-recognition.step_4: Can unlock remotely via bluetooth feature on the phone.

swing-door-descrip.step_3: Combine with smart elevator to call floors automatically
swing-door-descrip.step_4: Automatically open the door when there is an emergency notification

biometric-technology.step_1: Using biometric technology to extract facial features
biometric-technology.step_2: Authenticate residents, control access to areas to be monitored as well as use to call elevators, open barriers
biometric-technology.step_4: Can recognize multiple faces at the same time

products_v2.header: We have everything under control. We offer a broad range of control solutions to meet the needs of almost every project.

smart-home.header: New intelligent style for your home.
smart-home.subHeader: The Smart Home solution makes it possible for appliances to connect together in a smart system. Users use apps on phones to remotely control lighting, air conditioners, drapes, doors, etc. From there, they function more efficiently, more economically, and more efficiently. Improve the user experience.

section_1.title: Smart lighting
section_1.description: On arrival at the parking lot, users can easily reach the vacancy through.The fastest browser application.Led sign indicating a direction in foundations

section_2.title: Remote control for air conditioning
section_2.description: The solution uses equipment to connect the air conditioner to the telephony application. The air conditioner works with other appliances depending on the user scenario and the system is monitored and controlled remotely

section_3.title: Smart switch
section_3.description: Sliving's smart switch products allow users to control devices via the app, including lights, blinds, air conditioners or embedded multi-device operating scenarios. Different designs ranging from modern touch switches to traditional mechanical switches meet every user's needs and preferences

section_4.title: Sensors
section_4.description: The system of motion sensors, light sensors, door sensors, etc., combined with electrical equipment, creates a business case to meet the safety and comfort demands of the home

section_5.title: Smart curtain
section_5.description: Help remote control the curtain by telephone. The curtain system closes and opens automatically according to the program specified by the user

section_6.title: Door - gate motor
section_6.description: The gate - door motor is connected to the Sliving system for remote control via phone, saving users from having to go to the door to open and close, ensuring safety and reducing waiting time

parking.subHeader: The Smart Lighting solution not only provides a simple, light source, but also contributes to protecting the health of users and saving energy. The solution provides lighting effects that are appropriate for the environment, creating the best atmosphere and ambience for the user. Everything is controlled remotely, at any time, anywhere with facility.

section_1.title: Smart lock
section_1.description: Use fingerprinting to open or close the door. Built-in magnetic card reader, passcode. There are LEDs and bright tones for the suitcases. Can be unlocked from a distance via the phone's Bluetooth function

section_2.title: Smart revolving door
section_2.description: Zone safety management feature combined with proprietary software: Integrated facial recognition and magnetic card system. Combine with intelligent elevator to call floors automatically.Open the gate automatically in case of an emergency notification

section_3.title: Face recognition
section_3.description: Using biometric technology to extract facial recognition features: Authenticate residents, control access to areas to be monitored as well as used to call elevators, open barriers. Integrated into a security camera. Can recognize multiple faces at the same time

lighting.header: The technology of light gives your colour.
lighting.subHeader: Complex project management experience. When selecting an offshore software development company, ensure that they have

section_1.title: Protect your health
section_1.description: Sliving's lighting system prioritizes protecting users' health through the following criteria: Wide variety of CRI colour rendering index (CRI=70-95): suitable for work requirements in many different spaces, from houses, offices to factories... contributing to protecting eye health. Ability to change colour temperature: suitable for many activities, helping to focus on work, good mood and sound sleep for users

section_2.title: Energy saving
section_2.description: Sliving's lighting solutions ensure energy savings through the following advantages: Maintains high luminescence efficiency (>100 lm/w). Long LED lamp life thanks to the use of modern led chip technology (SMD-COB), for an average lifespan of 50,000 hours of lighting. The remote control system helps overcome the situation of forgetting to turn off the device when leaving the workplace.

section_3.title: Automatic control
section_3.description: Sliving's Smart Lighting makes the lighting system smarter through the following factors: Control and control the system remotely via the app. Set up an activity scenario by the schedule of activities and work
